#summary How to implement stuff and upload changes to the project
#labels Phase-Implementation

= How to edit the code =
Feel free to comment wherever you think that might help devs that will touch that area in the future. Please also use annotations as you see on other methods.

= How to commit changes =
Use some SVN client, i guess i don't have to tell you that :) In case you're new to this, i recommend the [http://subclipse.tigris.org/ Subclipse] plugin for Eclipse, most of the Java+Android editing is done in there anyway so it fits perfectly...
Btw, commit only source files, or resource files.. No point in adding Android libraries or bin files since they only occupy extra space in the project...
